topic.title: Add Custom Actions to the Contextual Menu?

section.title: Question
section.p: How do I add my own custom actions to the contextual menu using an API?

section.title: Answer
section.p: The WSAuthorEditorPageBase.addPopUpMenuCustomizer and WSTextEditorPage.addPopUpMenuCustomizer API methods allow you to customize the contextual menu shown either in the Author or Text modes. The API is available both in the standalone application and in the Eclipse plugin.
The WSTextEditorPage.addPopUpMenuCustomizer API method allows you to customize the contextual menu shown in Text mode.
